summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing for Startandgrowth AI consulting website. All 13 features tested successfully - homepage, theme toggle, language toggle, navigation, mobile menu, Google Calendar CTA, AI FACTORY teaser, Event page, Portfolio testimonials, Benefits section, Footer, and responsive design.

issues: Mobile hamburger menu doesn't auto-close when clicking a navigation link - minor UX improvement opportunity

critical_code_review_comments: Code is well-structured with proper React patterns
Theme and language context providers are correctly implemented
All translations are properly configured for EN/FR
Responsive design breakpoints are correctly implemented
Google Calendar link has proper security attributes (target=_blank, rel=noopener noreferrer)
test_credentials: No credentials needed - frontend-only static website
context_for_next_testing_agent: All frontend features working correctly. Theme toggle (dark/light), language toggle (EN/FR), navigation links, mobile hamburger menu, Google Calendar booking CTA, AI FACTORY teaser with /event link, Event page with all sections, Portfolio with 4 testimonials, Benefits with 6 cards, Footer with links - all verified working. Responsive design tested on desktop (1920px), tablet (768px), and mobile (390px).
